analyzed: kam gatim pa id ca gacchanti
yam gatim pa id ca gacchanti
an a pad cā a dāyādā
tat tam pakkuthitam ayaḥ guḷam ca
dīghe ca phāle cira ratta tāpite

original: Sāmā ca soṇā sabalā ca gijjhā,
analyzed: sāmā ca soṇā sabalā ca gijjhā
ratī hi na isam dukhinaḥ panītare
ye keci loke idha petti ghātinaḥ
yathā tam su ciṇṇam na anutappeyya pacchā ati
